title: Ion Ion (footballer)
text:
Ion Ion (born 21 June 1954) is a Romanian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager and former player.
In his coaching career he has coached several clubs from Oman, Bahrain, UAE and Qatar.
He managed <a href="CSA%20Steaua%20Bucure%C8%99ti%20%28football%29">Steaua București</a> for the 2017–18 season, but his contract was not renewed after the club failed to gain promotion to <a href="Liga%20III">Liga III</a>.
Honours.
As a player.
Club
Steaua București
Rapid București
As a manager.
Club
Steaua București
